description:
As http://anidb.net/ch109968 [Koguma] slowly adjusts to life with her Cub, she mentions to http://anidb.net/ch109970 [Reiko] that her luggage case seems convenient, so Reiko makes a call. After school, the pair visit a credit union, where the manager has an old Cub with a luggage case available to them.
Source: Funimation
